text: Charles Swenson is a producer and director. He worked with animated film for many years. In 1978 he joined Fred Wolf Films, who worked with the 1987 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles animated series. ==Productions== * The Mouse and His Child - 1977 * Puff the Magic Dragon - 1978 * An American Tail: Fievel Goes West - 1991 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1941 births Category:American animators Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from California Category:Screenwriters from California Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Charles Swenson
